creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a 1978 wall calendar with a pocket with papers inside and a picture of a landscape with a church; daisy ornament hanging over picture on calendar
portfolio: From Human Arts and Technology series
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard / JOANNE LEONARD
title: Memo Center, Church Steeple and Flower
